ComicInfo.Series: Foster Broussard: Demons Of The Gold Rush
ComicInfo.Title: Foster Broussard
ComicInfo.Summary: A british con-man Foster Broussard travels to San Francisco during the time of the great gold rush. risking his life and reputation on striking it rich. But things take a turn as he stands in the way of a rich industrialist looking for power.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a21.dev1 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-17 22:48:20. [Issue ID 291023]
